item.description:
Boston is welcoming back Prana and Rene, Master Tantra teachers from Portland, ME!!  Prana and Rene have joined our extended community twice/year during the last few years.  Their classes are always full and people leave feeling a deeper connection to themselves, and their bodies, a deeper state of relaxation and more information about the erotic on our lives.

 

This next workshop (straight back from Kripalu where they teach and annual introduction to Tantra workshop), will teach the skills of Sacred Touch.

 

Expand and deepen your connection to Self & others through sacred touch.  We will practice basic massages and therapeutic yoga stretches that:

 

  • enhance relaxation
  • open the heart center
  • excite the libido

 

Prior to receiving, we will practice communication skills to help us express our needs around touch.  We will also practice intimacy building techniques that will allow us to be more present and receptive when giving and receiving.

 

This Tantra To Love workshop is designed for beginners along with those who want to review and practice techniques within our Tantra community.  All are welcome to participate.

 

We will rotate partners as much as possible while maintaining sacred connection. Wear loose comfortable sensual clothing, free of buttons, zippers and jewelry.

 

Please refrain from wearing scented products.
item.name: Sacred Touch with Prana and Rene of Tantra To Love
